title: F/S Herzog and Kling Brown Hindu's PSA 3's
author: Kingcobb

posts.post_title: F/S Herzog and Kling Brown Hindu's PSA 3's
posts.post_content:
I have a nice looking PSA 3  Buck Herzog with Brown Hindu backs for sale. SOLD. The Kling has been sold. Paypal or USPS money order. Thanks for looking Daryl

Both cards are now Sold. Thanks everyone for your offers. Daryl
The Kling is sold. Will take $350 shipped with insurance for the Herzog. SOLD
I'll take Herzog if still available.
